name: 玄德
content: 锁定技，<procedureTrigger class="irreplaceable"><tickingTimeLimit class="irreplaceable"><tickingLimit class="irreplaceable"><preparingStage></preparingStage></tickingLimit></tickingLimit></procedureTrigger>，<draw><drawer class="irreplaceable"><you></you></drawer><drawHead></drawHead><drawQuantity class="irreplaceable"><equaling><equalingHead0></equalingHead0><lostHealth epithet='1'></lostHealth epithet='1'>+1的一半(<roundUp><roundUp0></roundUp0></roundUp>)</equaling>的</drawQuantity><drawEnd></drawEnd></draw>。

role.lore: 濬哲文明，溫恭允塞，玄德升聞

name: 允中
content: <procedureTrigger class="irreplaceable"><tickingTimeLimit class="irreplaceable"><tickingLimit class="irreplaceable"><actingStage></actingStage></tickingLimit><numberLimit class="irreplaceable"><numberLimiting><numberLimitingHead></numberLimitingHead>一<numberLimitingEnd></numberLimitingEnd></numberLimiting></numberLimit></tickingLimit></procedureTrigger>，<you></you><can><canHead></canHead><or><make><makeHead></makeHead><discard><discardRole class="irreplaceable"><choose><targetNumberLimit class="irreplaceable"><anyNumber></anyNumber>名</targetNumberLimit><targetLimit class="irreplaceable"><handCard></handCard>最多的<roleDefault></roleDefault></targetLimit></choose></discardRole><each><eachHead></eachHead><discardBody1></discardBody1><discardedCard class="replaceable"><choose><targetNumberLimit class="irreplaceable">一张</targetNumberLimit><cardDefault></cardDefault></choose></discardedCard></discard></each></make><orBody></orBody><make><makeHead></makeHead><draw><drawer class="irreplaceable"><choose><targetNumberLimit class="irreplaceable"><anyNumber></anyNumber>名</targetNumberLimit><targetLimit class="irreplaceable"><handCard></handCard>最少的<roleDefault></roleDefault></targetLimit></choose></drawer><each><eachHead></eachHead><drawHead></drawHead><drawQuantity class="irreplaceable">一张</drawQuantity><drawEnd></drawEnd></draw></each></make></or></can>。
